/usr/bin/c++    -std=c++11 -fopenmp -fPIC -pedantic -g -Wno-missing-field-initializers -Wno-switch -Wno-multichar -mssse3 -std=c++11    CMakeFiles/rs-color.dir/rs-color.c.o  -o rs-color -rdynamic ../../../librealsense2.so.2.8.1 -lGLU -lGL -lm -lglfw -lusb-1.0 ../../../third-party/realsense-file/librealsense-file.a -Wl,-rpath,/home/fapsros/catkin_ws/src/librealsense-2.8.1/build:
